CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function 'calculateWidthForText' is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) attacks. This is because it directly assigns the 'text' parameter to the 'textContent' property of the 'spacer' element without any sanitization or encoding. If the 'text' parameter contains malicious scripts, they will be executed when the 'spacer' element is rendered in the browser.
